tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ExperimentResults (
  experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name STRING,
  experiment_date DATE,
  experiment_duration INTERVAL,
  experiment_result JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id BIGINT,
  metric_name VARCHAR(255),
  metric_value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiment_results(experiment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentData (
    experiment_id INT,
    experiment_date DATE,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    sample_id INT,
    result_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    experiment_description TEXT,
    experiment_date TIMESTAMP,
    researcher_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_researcher FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE measurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    measurement_value FLOAT,
    measurement_time TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_experiment FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiments(experiment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiments_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    change_description TEXT,
    change_time TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_experiment_history FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiments(experiment_id)
);
